plot: Alex comes home one evening after work and realizes that his wife and son have disappeared. In the frantic search looking for his family, he meets Clara, who has just fled with her son from a jealous and violent husband.
title: Elías
plot_es: Alex comes home one evening after work and realizes that his wife and son have disappeared. In the frantic search looking for his family, he meets Clara, who has just fled with her son from a jealous and violent husband.
plot_en: Alex comes home one evening after work and realizes that his wife and son have disappeared. In the frantic search looking for his family, he meets Clara, who has just fled with her son from a jealous and violent husband.
